Hi, This is Tools pro. Albert Feron. I am a machine specialist, love the mahicne and tools, it’s helping us in everyway. Tools and machines have a little life in them, care them they will care you forever. I have set-up a site with US&Canada’s best tools shops. It’s categorized in regions and cities. Hope you’ll like it. It’s just a rough, if this get positive feedback, i will work more on it.
